Package org.placelab.proxy

Interface Summary
Servlet Implement one of these and register it with the ServletEngine to intercept requests coming in to the proxy
 

Class Summary
CoreServlet  
HTTPRequest A simplifies HTTPrequest with a URL and a set of HTTP headers
HTTPResponse A simple HTTP response.
ProxyServletEngine Register Servlets with this class to have them intercept requests through the web proxy.
ServletEngineProxyTest
